name: RadiographyOfFaceHeadOrNeck
title: Radiography of face, head or neck
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set encodes a Action defining the concept sinonasal imaging for the AAO-HNSF guideline on Allergic Rhinitis),(Data Element Scope: This value set is intended to work with the data element type, Diagnostic Study),(Inclusion Criteria: Search terms included: ^sino* ^sina* ^CT ^MRI sinus ^radiography ^x-ray face skull orbit sinus imag* -structure -bladder -kidney -angio* -venous* -pelvis -sagital -finding -excision -disorder -radioisotope -heart -obliteration -pharynx -substance -lower -ultrasound -chest -mammography -marrow -repair -aspiration -core -foriegn -removal -drainage -aort* -fistulo* -ligation -echo* -pathology -perfus -carot* -irrigation -loss -reduction -fossa -situation -lavage -neck -prostate -thorax -testicular -release -ductal -manipul* -density -gland -fistul* -product -gastric -probe -abdomen -rhythm -puncture -skeletal -blood -soft -postmort* -media* -preload -package -change -whole -defect -NOS -refer -cath* -plan -misc* -operation* -morphologic -analysis -observable -cyst -brain -biopsy -orbit -endosco* -pulm* -sinusotomy -gaseous -scanning -cardiac -liver -thyroid -enlargement -hip -arter* -bowel -ultraso* -exterioriz* -lumbar -myocard* -qualifier -foundation -glomerular -radionucleotide list truncated),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
